alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 12:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and south central Leon Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1206 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crawfordville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Hilliardville, Bethel, Eight Mile Pond and Vereen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
